required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Garcinia Mangostana L Rind and Solanum Lycopersicum Fructus Trial to Prevent Exercise-induced Oxidative Stress
clinical_study.official_title: Randomized Clinical Trial of the Effect of G. Mangostana L Rind and Solanum Lycopersicum Fructus Extract to Prevent Exercise-induced Oxidative Stress

collaborator.agency: Ministry of Research, Technology and Higher Education, Republic of Indonesia

brief_summary.textblock: Treatments are an administration of a mixed extract of Garcinia mangostana 400mg and Solanum Lycopersicum Fructus 200mg (OKSI(R) POM TR 193324351) and placebo control.

detailed_description.textblock:
Double-blinded Randomized Clinical Trial
The population of study will involve sedentary men, the student in Universitas Negeri Semarang aged 18-25 years old, targetted populations are 30 subjects consist of 15 treatment group and the rest 15 placebo-control group. Voluntary sampling will be conducted. Information to the candidates delivered directly, leaflets, and social media broadcasting.
Two arm treatment to be given is an administration of a mixture extract of Garcinia mangostana 400mg and Solanum Lycopersicum Fructus 200mg (OKSI(R) POM TR 193324351) and placebo control.
The administration of extract treatment and placebo will be given for four weeks.
The primary effect that will be observed is the changes in malondialdehyde (MDA) and high-sensitivity Cardiac-Troponin I (hs-cTnI) level after an ergo-cycle exercise test.
The secondary effect of the treatment that will be observed is the baseline and post-treatment parameters of MDA levels.

primary_outcome.measure: Change ergo-cycle exercise test response to MDA level after 4 weeks treatment
primary_outcome.description: measuring exercise-induced oxidative stress, based on pre-and post-exercise MDA levels

primary_outcome.measure: Change ergo-cycle exercise test response to hs-cTnI level after 4 weeks treatment
primary_outcome.description: measuring exercise-induced oxidative stress, based on pre-and post-exercise hs-cTnI levels

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline MDA levels after 4 weeks treatment
secondary_outcome.description: measuring MDA levels baseline and post-treatment

arm_group.description: administration of a mixed extract of Garcinia mangostana 400mg and Solanum Lycopersicum Fructus 200mg (OKSI(R) POM TR 193324351)

intervention.description: Administration of mixed extract of Garcinia mangostana 400mg and Solanum Lycopersicum Fructus 200mg (OKSI(R) POM TR 193324351)
intervention.other_name: Brand name: OKSI (Indonesian Food and Drug Administration POM registered number :TR 193324351)

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- sedentary lifestyle
- apparently healthy person
- willing to use the smart-phone application for diet and physical activity monitoring
Exclusion Criteria:
- pathological appearance in ECG
